ICARUS GENERAL TERMS OF USE

Welcome to the ICARUS Platform! Before accessing or using the ICARUS Platform, please read carefully this Terms of Use agreement that has been prepared by the ICARUS Consortium. MISSION OF THE PLATFORM
The ICARUS Platform aims at helping companies and organisations whose operations are directly or indirectly linked to aviation, to effectively check-in and manage their aviation data, to share / trade / enrich their existing data sources and intelligence, and to simultaneously gain data-driven insights into their operations.

PROTECTION OF DATA
Data uploaded to the ICARUS Platform shall not include any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (data subject); an identifiable person is one who can be identified directly or indirectly, in particular by reference to an identifier such as such as a name, an identification number, location data, an online identifier or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity of that natural person in compliance with the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation).

Data uploaded to the ICARUS Platform shall include sample data. The ICARUS Platform shall make the sample data available to authorized users who are eligible to acquire the data. It is therefore acknowledged that sample data is example data only, which may not be complete, current, or accurate.
